column3: Let all here present attest that Ser Aymeric, acting on\x02\x10\x01\x03behalf of the archbishop, has appended his signature.
I do hereby declare...
That from this day forth, the Holy See of Ishgard\x02\x10\x01\x03shall once more be counted a member of the Eorzean Alliance.
Let our nations move forward as one,\x02\x10\x01\x03and stand united against the Garlean Empire!
For the future of Eorzea!
For the future of Eorzea!
There you are.
A noble monument to a noble soul.
From here, Lord Haurchefant can watch over all of Ishgard...
It has been a long and arduous journey.\x02\x10\x01\x03And we have lost much and more along the way.
Yet come what may, we must stay true to our purpose and press on.
That's right, you two! It's high time\x02\x10\x01\x03we got back to rebuilding the Scions!
Which means we're going to need money\xe2\x94\x80and lots of it!
So ends a glorious chapter in their tale.
However, tumultuous days yet lie ahead for Ishgard.
After a thousand years under the yoke of the church,\x02\x10\x01\x03the people take their first tentative steps into the unknown.
And though they spy a glimmer of peace upon the horizon,\x02\x10\x01\x03Nidhogg's vengeful shadow yet remains to darken the way.
Be that as it may...
So long as the young commander of the Temple Knights\x02\x10\x01\x03and his heroic companions are there to guide them,\x02\x10\x01\x03the people may hold fast to hope\xe2\x94\x80
the hope that, one day, true peace will return to Ishgard,\x02\x10\x01\x03and that man and dragon may live in harmony once more.
Let the deeds writ herein never be forgot,
that they may inspire generations yet unborn to strive ever heavensward.
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03So Lahabrea and Igeyorhm have fallen.\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03Bested by mortals in their attempt to initiate the eighth Rejoining. That they should be so complacent...\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03And now it falls to me to deal with the consequences...\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
(-Elidibus-)Unlike the others, Lahabrea was of this world, and had thus partaken of Lord Zodiark's power... The effects of his loss will be keenly felt.
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03Without intervention, the balance between Light and Darkness will begin to shift, placing our mission in jeopardy.\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03Hydaelyn's champion has grown too strong. \x02\x08\r\xe9\x05\xff\x04Her\xff\x04His\x03 might encroaches upon the realm of gods.\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03Equilibrium must needs be restored. The time is come for you and yours to join the fray...\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
(-Elidibus-)\x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xc49c\x03...Warrior of Darkness.\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03
Remind me: why is there no rest for the righteous?
Because they \x02\x1a\x02\x02\x03care\x02\x1a\x02\x01\x03, Master Garlond.
Of all the things they could have picked to play with... That's not a toy, you bloody fools\xe2\x94\x80it's a primal!
